signalPage.title: {category} Signal
tooltip.riskOn: Risk-On: Markets favor growth assets (stocks, crypto). Generally a good environment for higher-risk investments.
tooltip.riskOff: Risk-Off: Investors prefer safety (bonds, gold, cash). Caution advised for risky assets.
tooltip.mixed: Mixed signals from the market. Consider smaller positions or wait for clearer direction.
tooltip.usd: US Dollar strength. Strong dollar typically hurts crypto and commodities. Weak dollar often means risk-on.
tooltip.volatility: Market fear gauge (VIX). Low = calm markets. High = fearful, prices may swing wildly.
tooltip.10yRate: US Treasury yields. Rising rates compete with stocks. Falling rates are bullish for risk assets.
tooltip.sentiment: Fear & Greed Index (0-100). Low = buying opportunity. High = overheated.
tooltip.spread: 10Y minus 2Y Treasury yield. Negative (inverted) warns of recession.
tooltip.regime: Market regime based on events, sentiment, volatility.
tooltip.liveNews: Real-time geopolitical monitoring via GDELT. Scans global news every 6 hours for events that could impact markets: tariffs, sanctions, military conflicts, political crises.
tooltip.predictionMarkets: Real-money prediction markets from Polymarket. Shows what traders are betting on for crypto prices, Fed policy, and economic outcomes. High recession odds or bearish crypto sentiment can dampen signals.
tooltip.contrarianFear: Contrarian signal: When fear is extreme, markets often overreact. Historically, buying during extreme fear has led to better returns.
tooltip.contrarianGreed: Contrarian signal: When greed is extreme, markets may be overheated. Historically, this precedes pullbacks.
tooltip.fearGreedIndex: The Fear & Greed Index measures market sentiment from 0 (extreme fear) to 100 (extreme greed). Values below 25 or above 75 often signal turning points.
tooltip.upcomingEvents: Major economic events that can move markets. FOMC = Fed interest rate decisions. CPI = inflation data. NFP = jobs report. These events often cause volatility—consider reducing position sizes before them.
vip.title: Don't just get signals. Get the reasoning.
vip.subtitle: You've had the right call before—but did you understand why? VIP gives you the full context behind every trade, so you can make informed decisions:
vip.feature.whaleAlertsDesc: See when big money loads up—options flow & on-chain data in plain English
vip.feature.aiDebateDesc: Bull vs Bear AI agents argue every trade. If they can't agree, we don't trade.
vip.feature.fullReasoningDesc: Every signal explains WHY—so you understand it, not just follow it
vip.feature.privateTelegramDesc: Real-time chat with serious traders. Ask questions, share setups, get gut checks.
vip.feature.mobileAlertsDesc: Telegram pings the moment consensus hits—no app to check
vip.feature.teamAccessDesc: Market freaking out? We're in the chat with you.
